original_text: But the earth came to the help of the woman, and the earth opened its mouth and swallowed the river that the dragon had poured from his mouth.
korean_text: 땅이 여자를 도와 그 입을 벌려 용의 입에서 토한 강물을 삼키니

sentences.original_text: But the earth came to the help of the woman
and the earth opened its mouth
that the dragon had poured from his mouth
